review_data.title: Nice Cordon Bleu but average otherwise
review_data.content: This is a small restaurant/bar so aimed more at outdoor dining. Staff are friendly and helpful. Good choice of Cordon Blue on the menu and it tasted great. Other items are OK ... good but not great. Value is good with large portions and sensible...More

review_data.title: Hamburger sind ausgezeichnet

review_data.title: Nice Cordon Bleu
review_data.content: Quite a nice place in the middle of Zurich to eat a Cordon Bleu in the sun. The meat tasted quite good and was rather juicy -- just how I like it. Portions a big and prices are average for the area. Staff was friendly...More
